description.narrative: By 2025, UNICEF staff and partners capacity is strengthened for disaster prevention and management, which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, UNICEF Somalia staff and partners have enhanced capacity to design, implement and monitor programmes, and as well as generate evidence through research and evaluations

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2025, UNICEF staff and partners capacity is strengthened for disaster prevention and management

description.narrative: UNICEF Somalia’s ongoing humanitarian action focuses on an integrated, inclusive, and multi-sectoral humanitarian response. The total number of people including children reached in 2021 is 224,611 in Nutrition,281,232 in Health, 831,296 in WASH, 158,088 in Child Protection, 176,073 in Education. In addition to providing timely, efficient, effective and accountable humanitarian response, UNICEF through a joint partnership and engagement with WFP, FAO and the government led the launch of the Phase III of the Joint Resilience Programme funded by KFW, which enables the agencies build on gains made in Phase I & II of the program. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2021
